desc: Bootleg Horse Riding Pants for Women. Our riding pants are so comfortable you won't want to take them off. The best alternative to jodhpurs; featuring contoured waistlines, comfort waistbands﻿, tummy control and flattering bootleg style. Purpose Built for Horse Riding. Money Back Guarantee. Easy Returns and Exchanges.
